CustomField.description: **System Calculated/Conditional/Override** The posting status for the Sales Order represents the posting status of related Invoices or the posting status of the Cash Sale Receipt, depending on the Posting Entity.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: **System Calculated/Conditional/Override** The posting status for the Sales Order represents the posting status of related Invoices or the posting status of the Cash Sale Receipt, depending on the Posting Entity.
CustomField.label: Posting Status
